an4.220:4.1: “Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
an4.220:4.3: Assaddho hoti, dussīlo hoti, kusīto hoti, duppañño hoti—
an4.220:4.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
an4.220:5.1: Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge.
an4.220:5.3: Saddho hoti, sīlavā hoti, āraddhavīriyo hoti, paññavā hoti—
an4.220:5.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge”ti.
